# a grey, gelatinous deposit in the sulphurous waters of the [[Barèges]] spa
types.html:
barégine f (plural barégines)

  1. a grey, gelatinous deposit in the sulphurous waters of the Barèges spa
trans: a grey, gelatinous deposit in the sulphurous waters of the Barèges spa
